response.content:
Hi Satyam, 
Thank you for liking our course :)
Like you know the codes are huge, so typing them would make the course length exponentially long and you all will loose the interest by seeing me typing the codes every time. So to keep the course short and sweet I've to paste the codes sometimes. I hope you understand. As far as QA section is concerned, I haven't seen any question from you in my dashboard. 
Thanks!

results.content:
The course is well designed regarding course structure, level of difficulty and practice exercises. It's amazingly good for beginners in terms of getting hands-on fast.

Class materials are well organized and referenced. Material taught is clear and concise. However, since I am a beginner in React VR and 360, so I would have to practice from the exercises to have the hands-on.
And yes since instrcutor has not used any jargon or any fancy language so there was no point where I my focus got diverted. I would recommend this course to all who want to ramp up with virtual reality.
results.content_html:
The course is well designed regarding course structure, level of difficulty and practice exercises. It's amazingly good for beginners in terms of getting hands-on fast.

Class materials are well organized and referenced. Material taught is clear and concise. However, since I am a beginner in React VR and 360, so I would have to practice from the exercises to have the hands-on.
And yes since instrcutor has not used any jargon or any fancy language so there was no point where I my focus got diverted. I would recommend this course to all who want to ramp up with virtual reality.

results.content: I just learned React VR and React 360 from this course. It was a good learning experience. Great course for newbies.
results.content_html: I just learned React VR and React 360 from this course. It was a good learning experience. Great course for newbies.

results.content: Thorough, step by step lessons. The lectures were easy to follow. The instructor presents his knowledge in very simple words.
results.content_html: Thorough, step by step lessons. The lectures were easy to follow. The instructor presents his knowledge in very simple words.

results.content: The course is comprehensive. The instructor explains the critical and conceptual elements very beautifully. I am used to how 3d works ( 3dsMax) and react-js and react-native, hence I am familiar with most concepts in this course. And for me, this course exactly gave a beautiful required knowledge on how to use React 360. Not to mention the instructor has taken complete care of explaining everything for beginners.  I would for sure look forward to more courses from this instructor.

results.content:
Course useless for 70% of the time, because it doesn't make sense to talk about RectVR yet (a serious thing to do would have been to remove the initial part or take another course)
Superficial and not very useful explanations. A whole part is missing that would have been useful to go into. The movement part is very interesting, but unclear in the explanations.
Money thrown away

results.content:
An impressive in-depth course that encompasses everything you need to know about VR technologies. The lectures turns to be well guide with step-by-step and focused content. I am impressed with the author's ability to share his knowledge and dedication needed to create such a high quality VR apps. I especially loved that art gallery application. Having those concepts in mind, now I will start creating my own tour application.

A big thanks!
